header.under: Your simple multi purpose Discord bot. Free and <1>open source</1> forever.

votes.heading: Votes
votes.description: Want to settle a dispute or make a decision? Let your members vote on it. You can create polls with multiple options. Uses the new Message Component feature.

autovoice.heading: Automatic voice channels
autovoice.description: Create voice channels by simply joining a voice channel. Don't worry about leftovers, they will be deleted automatically.

reddit.heading: Reddit
reddit.description: Upvote and downvote messages to affect their author's karma. Be careful though, low karma users might get punished.
